prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Guitar, Piano, Drums, Brass, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Drums, Brass, Piano, and Guitar are all featured in this song, but Bass is absent.

Style 2: This composition is comprised of Reed, Guitar, Piano, Drums, and Brass, but Bass is not included.

Style 3: This piece is performed with Reed, Guitar, Piano, Drums, and Brass, omitting Bass.
